meanings.definition: A person trained to give emergency medical treatment or assist medical professionals.
meanings.sent1: The paramedicals rushed to the scene to help the injured person.
meanings.sent2: The hospital hired more paramedicals to support the medical team.
meanings.sent3: The paramedicals joked that they were like medical superheroes, always ready to save the day.
meanings.sent4: In times of crisis, paramedicals are the guardian angels of the community.
meanings.sent5: The paramedicals' quick response saved many lives during the emergency.

meanings.definition: Relating to or denoting the work of paramedicals.
meanings.sent1: The hospital implemented new paramedical protocols to improve patient care.
meanings.sent2: The paramedical equipment was essential for the emergency response team.
meanings.sent3: The paramedical uniforms were designed for both comfort and functionality.
meanings.sent4: Her paramedical skills were praised by the medical team for their efficiency.
meanings.sent5: The paramedical training program focused on hands-on experience and practical skills.
